tasks.label: C/C++: Compile with g++
args: Write-Host 'Compiling ${fileBasename}...'; try { & 'C:/mingw64/bin/g++.exe' '${file}' -o '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe' -Wall -Wextra -std=c++17; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Compilation successful!' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'Executable created: ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe' -ForegroundColor Yellow } else { Write-Host 'Compilation failed with exit code:' $LASTEXITCODE -ForegroundColor Red } } catch { Write-Host 'Error during compilation:' $_.Exception.Message -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Compile C++ file with detailed output

tasks.label: C/C++: Build and Run
args: Write-Host 'Building and running ${fileBasename}...'; try { & 'C:/mingw64/bin/g++.exe' '${file}' -o '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe' -Wall -Wextra -std=c++17; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Compilation successful! Running program...' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host '--- Program Output ---' -ForegroundColor Cyan; & '${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; Write-Host '--- End of Program ---' -ForegroundColor Cyan } else { Write-Host 'Compilation failed!' -ForegroundColor Red } } catch { Write-Host 'Error:' $_.Exception.Message -ForegroundColor Red }
